content: {"name": "NC COALITION AGAINST DOMESTIC VIOLENCE (NCCADV)", "alternate_name": "", "description": "DOMESTIC ABUSE\n\nWe lead the state\u2019s movement to end domestic violence and to enhance work with survivors through collaborations, innovative trainings, prevention, technical assistance, state policy development and legal advocacy", "email": "", "url": "https://ncadv.org", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "3710 University Drive", "address_2": null, "city": "Durham", "state_province": "NC", "postal_code": "27707", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 35.9680106, "longitude": -78.9503021}, "phones": [{"number": "(919) 956-9124", "type": "voice"}]}
